subject: Re: How to get package dependecies list before installing a package.
body:
On 6/7/07, hridyesh pant  wrote:
> Hi ,
> Is there any way to find out what other package dependencies needed for
> an un-install package in unix?
>
> Thanks
> Hridyesh

Yes and no.  Your best bet is to use your native package management
software to install and uninstall modules.  If you need to manually
uninstall a module start reading here

http://www.nntp.perl.org/group/perl.beginners/2007/04/msg90851.html

-- 
To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
http://learn.perl.org/
